name: The Awakening
storyline: After two years, you finally wake up from a coma which was caused by a car accident. You are suffering from amnesia, and you have not the slightest idea in what kind of situation you are in. Go along the journey to find out whom you truly are.
summary: The Awakening is a choice-driven adult visual novel with sandbox elements. You as the player are in recovery for amnesia and must navigate your new world with the help of your otherworldly sidekick.
